共通シップに移動しますか？"

"The \"Item Transaction Password\" is used to
prevent item transactions in case your account
is stolen.

In order to use specific features (such as item
trading), you need to set a password.

Personal information like date of birth, address,
phone number, serial numbers, etc are easy to
guess and not safe.
Please do not use these."

registered will be required to trade items.

Please enter the password using your mouse
and the buttons on the right."

registered will be required to trade items."
